attributes.title: Broken phone
attributes.review: To my fellow trump supporters DO NOT download the app. Within an hour after downloading the app it trashed my phone. Our great president needs to fix this so we can safely download it and support but until then dont. I lost all my photos that I will never be able to get back, including pics from the rally I went to. My contacts got deleted, and my phone got infected with a virus l. I even had to get a new phone it crashed it so bad.
